reviewText:
Attractively unusual and old fashioned, this
movie washed away the CGI- inundated, empty explosive films that pervade the industry.

Lea Thompson is stellar while Richard Grieco displays a depth that remind you that he should get bigger Hollywood roles.

This indie flick is a winner.
If you don't love Leah Thompson going in to this movie, you will afterwards.  There is not a bad part to this movie.  It is beyond us why this movie wasn't released to theaters and on Blu-Ray.
This was bought by my husband. I haven't watched it.but he is absolutely crazy about it. He says it is one of his all time favorites.

Richard Grieco is good in this, as a nice, sensative, and all-around good guy.  His chemistry with the "girlfriend" and Lea Thompson, makes this movie worth seeing

,
